name: Forward Always Forward
description:
this is a Work In Progress year end release.  a single level featuring several opponents and a sorta boss type.  nothing currently happens if you 'win',.  hence WIP.  more is planed, just need to get to building it.  just added a soundscape/music to the FAIL mode,. game play is still being defined,. . enjoy.

CONTROLS

  • WASD or ARROWS plus Mouse 
  • LMB fire, K key fire
  • press M to toggle Mouse/Key mode
  • J and L keys to rotate in Keys mode, or Mouse to Aim w/ cursor in regular mode
  • ..,

thanks for playing ;)

thinking to use this framework to further develop some AI ideas i have,. .
